mainSequence.step: Attore faces a challenge by invoking the Command entity.
Command receives input from the actor by executing the receiveInput method.
If the challenge is an enigma, Logic executes the indovinelliTempio method.
Command verifies the result of the enigma challenge.
If the result is correct, Logic executes canAccess and Command navigates to the next room.
If the result is incorrect, Logic instructs Command to navigate back to the previous room.
If the challenge is related to a creature, Logic initiates a fight with the creature.
Command verifies the weapon possessed by the actor.
If the weapon is possessed, Logic executes canAccess and Command moves to the next room.
If the weapon is not possessed, Logic instructs Command to navigate back to the previous room.
